meanings.sent1: Her imperiousness in the meeting made everyone feel small.
meanings.sent2: His imperiousness often led to conflicts with his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The cat's imperiousness over the other pets was comical.
meanings.sent4: The imperiousness of the storm clouds warned of an impending downpour.
meanings.sent5: The imperiousness of the queen bee kept the hive in order.

meanings.sent3: The imperiousness look on the cat's face made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The imperiousness mountain stood tall among the others in the range.
meanings.sent5: His imperiousness gaze made others feel inferior in his presence.

meanings.sent1: The imperiousness way he gave orders left no room for argument.
meanings.sent2: Her imperiousness behavior made it clear she was used to being in charge.
